title: Crevettes Ð° la marocaine
directions: Drain the shrimp on a double layer of paper towels. Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the spices and garlic , and stir for a minute to release the flavors.

Add the shrimp and cook for 1-2 minutes over medium-high heat until they turn a little pink, then turn over. Cook until the shrimp are pink all over , stirring frequently. Stir in the herbs and serve hot.
ingredients: 2 oz uncooked shelled large shrimp (defrosted if frozen)
1/2 tsp harissa paste or hot paprika
